tika-s0403t9:2_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame dutiye ca natthi vattabbaṁ. Tatiye ājānanato aññā,
tika-s0403t9:2_3: Tassā pana phalabhāvato maggaphalapaññā taṁsahagatā sammāsaṅkappādayo ca idha ‘‘aññā’’ti vuttā.
tika-s0403t9:2_7: anadhigate adhigatasaññī hutvā adhigataṁ mayāti mānena. Catutthādīni uttānatthāneva.
